AboutUs.title: About Us
AboutUs.title2desc: Surface Fire prioritizes safety with its high quality fire extinguishing products. With our innovative solutions, we keep you safe anytime and anywhere.
AboutUs.AboutUsDesc: Güzey Yangın is a fire extinguishing products company that specializes in fire safety and offers reliable solutions to its customers. Offering fire extinguishing products based on the latest technology, prioritizing the safety of people and businesses, Güzey Yangın maintains its leadership in the sector. As Güzey Yangın, we offer a wide range of products to meet the needs of our customers. Our various products, from fire extinguishers to fire extinguishing systems, are produced in accordance with high quality standards and international safety norms.
AboutUs.VisionMissionDesc: As Güzey Yangın, we have the vision of becoming a leading fire safety solutions provider for a safer world in the future. We aim to be a brand known for innovative solutions that minimize fire risks, contributing to the general safety of our customers, employees and society. Our mission is to provide our customers with high-quality fire extinguishing products, keeping their safety at the highest level and at the same time contributing to environmental sustainability. By constantly investing in R&D, we follow the latest technological developments in the sector and aim to establish long-term reliable relationships by prioritizing customer satisfaction.
AboutUs.OurWorkDesc: Our product portfolio is designed to meet the needs of a wide range of users. Our work aims not only to provide our products, but also to inform and educate our customers on proper use, maintenance and emergency planning. With a culture that encourages innovation, we continually strive to provide proactive solutions to future fire safety challenges.

Home.welcomeTitle: To Put Safety First, Meet Güzey Yangın!
Home.welcomeDesc: As Güzey Yangın, we constantly strive for fire safety and remain determined to offer the most reliable solutions to our customers. Our work includes providing high-quality fire suppression products that comply with industry standards, keeping customer satisfaction at the forefront.

Referances.title: References
Referances.desc: We have established successful business partnerships with many companies and created their infrastructure.

WhyUs.title: Why should you choose us, what do we offer you?
WhyUs.desc: We offer reliable and effective solutions with our expertise in fire extinguishing systems and our quality product portfolio. By adopting customer satisfaction as our priority, we provide fast and professional service with our experienced team. As your leading solution partner in fire safety, we stand out with our reliability and quality.

Services.title: Our Core Services
Services.desc: Our leading company in fire extinguishing systems offers customized solutions by taking into account the building characteristics with its professional project design service. It selects fire extinguishing equipment with its wide product range and provides seamless integration into existing systems.

serviceFirst.title: Project Planning Service
serviceFirst.desc: Our professional team offers solution-oriented approaches to maximize your safety by designing customized fire extinguishing projects based on your building's characteristics and risk analysis.

serviceSecond.title: Product Selection
serviceSecond.desc: With our wide product range, we select fire extinguishing equipment suitable for all kinds of environments and offer a complete security solution by providing seamless integration into existing systems.

serviceThird.title: Training and Consultancy
serviceThird.desc: Müşterilerimize yönelik düzenlediğimiz eğitimlerle, yangın güvenliği bilincini artırır ve düzenli danışmanlık hizmetleriyle sistemlerin etkin kullanımını ve bakımını garanti altına alırız.
